B2 one of the many soft, light things that cover a bird's body, consisting of a long, thin, central part with material like hairs along each side: peacock/ostrich feathersfeather pillow I like to sleep on a firm mattress with feather pillows (= those containing feathers).ruffle its feathers The bird ruffled its feathers.
